snippet.title: RICO - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
You and your buddy are a pair of loose-cannon police partners with twenty-four hours to crack a case as part of an elite organised crime taskforce. Find out more: http://rico-game.com/

RICO, developed by Ground Shatter and published digitally by Rising Star Games, will be available globally from autumn 2018 across all major gaming platforms.

PS4 - Xbox One - Switch - PC

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RisingStarGames/
Twitter: https://www.instagram.com/risingstargames/
Instagram: https://twitter.com/risingstargames

https://www.risingstargames.com
